animeTitle: Ojarumaru Yakusoku no Natsu Ojaru to Semira Movie
animeDescription: A short film introduces Semira, a strange boy who comes to play with Ojaru and his chums and bears a marked resemblance to a boy of the same name who spent a summer with the village elders when they were boys, long ago.  (Source: AnimeVice)
animeStaff: [['Daichi Akitarou', ['Director', 'Storyboard']], ['Tanaka Kazuya', ['Sound Director']], ['Tamano Harumi', ['Episode Director']], ['Yoshida Reiko', ['Screenplay']]]
